node.doctext:
How many "ilikeit"s do your writeups have? (NOTE: the likedit table was erased, and new ilikeits were not being saved for an unknown period of time. This issue was just fixed 2008-08-25)

[% my $dbh = $DB->getDatabaseHandle(); return 'No database handle!' unless $dbh; my $rows; my $str; my $dbrow; my $queryText = "SELECT node.node_id,COUNT(likedit.likedit_node) AS likeditcount FROM node,likedit WHERE node.node_id=likedit.likedit_node AND node.type_nodetype=117 AND node.author_user=".$$USER{node_id}." GROUP BY likedit.likedit_node ORDER BY likeditcount DESC,node.title"; #$queryText = "SELECT node.node_id #FROM node,likedit #WHERE node.node_id=likedit.likedit_node # AND node.author_user=".$$USER{node_id}; #$queryText = "SELECT * FROM likedit LIMIT 50"; #$queryText = "SELECT * FROM node,likedit WHERE node.node_id=likedit.likedit_node AND type_nodetype=117 AND author_user=".$$USER{node_id}; #$queryText = "SELECT * FROM node,likedit WHERE node.node_id=likedit.likedit_node AND node.author_user=".$$USER{node_id}." LIMIT 50"; #$str .= $queryText; $rows = $dbh->prepare($queryText) or return $rows->errstr; $rows->execute() or return $rows->errstr; $str .= '
    '; while($dbrow = $rows->fetchrow_arrayref) { $str .= '
  1. '.linkNode($$dbrow[0]).' - '.$$dbrow[1].'
    2. '; } $str .= '
'; return $str; %]
[% return; my $dbh = $DB->getDatabaseHandle(); return 'No database handle!' unless $dbh; my $rows; my $urows; my $str; my $dbrow; $str .= '

Resurrected Nodes by node_id

'; my $queryText = "SELECT node.node_id,node.author_user FROM node,heaven WHERE node.node_id=heaven.node_id ORDER BY node.title,node.node_id"; $rows = $dbh->prepare($queryText) or return $rows->errstr; $rows->execute() or return $rows->errstr; $str .= '
    '; while($dbrow = $rows->fetchrow_arrayref) { $str .= '
  1. '.linkNode($$dbrow[0]).' by '.linkNode($$dbrow[1]).'
    2. '; #$queryText = 'UPDATE heaven SET author_user='.($$dbrow[1]+100000000).' WHERE node_id='.$$dbrow[0]; #$urows = $dbh->prepare($queryText); #$urows->execute(); #$str .= '
  2. '.$queryText.'
    3. '; } $str .= '
'; #my $queryText = "SELECT node_id,author_user,title FROM heaven where author_user>=10000000"; #$rows = $dbh->prepare($queryText) # or return $rows->errstr; #$rows->execute() # or return $rows->errstr; #$str .= '
    '; #while($dbrow = $rows->fetchrow_arrayref) #{ # $str .= '
  1. '.linkNode($$dbrow[0]).' by '.$$dbrow[1].'
    2. '; #} #$str .= '
'; $str .= '

Resurrected nodes by title/author

'; $str .= '

This works, but takes about 3 minutes to run and returns about 5650 results, so I exited out of the code before the query

'; return $str; #my $queryText = "SELECT node.node_id,node.author_user FROM node,heaven WHERE node.author_user=heaven.author_user AND #node.title=heaven.title ORDER BY node.title,node.node_id"; #$rows = $dbh->prepare($queryText) # or return $rows->errstr; #$rows->execute() # or return $rows->errstr; #$str .= '
    '; #while($dbrow = $rows->fetchrow_arrayref) #{ # $str .= '
  1. '.linkNode($$dbrow[0]).' by '.linkNode($$dbrow[1]).'
    2. '; #} #$str .= '
'; return $str; %]
node.title: in10se's sandbox4
